name: Running to Death (domischenk)
description:
Little Side-Scroller game for GameDevTV Jam 2022.

The goal is to obtain all 4 achievements with as few deaths as possible.
the minimum of Deaths you need is 2 :-D

There are 4 Achievements to be found:

  • Standard
  • Hidden
  • Soul
  • (A Japanese samurai suicide ritual)

Controls:

A / D : Move
Space : Jump
Left Shift/Left Ctrl + ??  (?? stands for another Key)

Code can be found here: https://github.com/domiSchenk/RunningToDeath
